DOC.brief_summary: Phase 3 study examine treatment ITCA 650 compare glimepiride add metformin monotherapy reduce HbA1c patient type 2 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate ITCA 650 Compared Glimepiride Treatment Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: HbA1c 7.5 % 10.5 % metformin monotherapy BMI 25 & 45 kg/m2 thiazolidinedione , sulfonylurea , DPP4 , exenatide , alpha glucosidase inhibitor , meglitinides insulin within last 3 month history pancreatitis
